title: Saturday Night Massacre
added: In January 2021, it was reported that President [[Donald Trump]] had devised a plan with [[Jeffrey Bossert Clark|Jeffrey Clark]], an assistant attorney general, to replace acting Attorney General [[Jeffrey A. Rosen]] with Clark in an [[Attempts to overturn the 2020 United States presidential election|attempt to overturn the 2020 election]]. Upon hearing of this plan, other members of DOJ leadership threatened to resign, prompting comparisons to another Saturday Night Massacre.<ref>{{cite news |last1=Benner |first1=Katie |title=Trump and Justice Dept. Lawyer Said to Have Plotted to Oust Acting Attorney General |url=https://www.nytimes.com/2021/01/22/us/politics/jeffrey-clark-trump-justice-department-election.html |access-date=January 23, 2021 |work=[[The New York Times]] |date=January 22, 2021 |location=Washington}}</ref>

title: Saturday Night Massacre
